name: ¡ Hurra para maquilladora!
description:
¡ Hurra para maquilladora! or "Hooray for Makeup artist is a game about  creepy makeup artist trying to prove whose better at putting on makeup on clients.  You play as Arianna a girl who just wants to make it big in the industry! 

This game was inspired by a randomizer game maker on twitter! My game was, "third-person spiritual sequel to viva piñata about creepy makeup artists"
